text: The Preacher's Wife is a 1996 American Christmas romantic comedy movie starring Denzel Washington, Whitney Houston, and Courtney B. Vance. It is a remake of the 1947 film The Bishop's Wife. ==References== Category:1996 comedy-drama movies Category:1996 romantic comedy movies Category:1996 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Christmas movies Category:Movies directed by Penny Marshall Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: The Preacher's Wife
